dataSet.name: DataSet1

v8:item.v8:content: Debt balance as of the end (cur.)
Debt balance as of the start (cur.)
Debt balance as of the end
Debt balance as of the start

dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Recorder END AS Recorder, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SecondPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.MinutePeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.HourPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.DayPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.WeekPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.MonthPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.YearPeriod, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Company, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Counterparty, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Contract, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Document, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Order, AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.Contract.SettlementsCurrency AS Currency, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountOpeningBalanceDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountOpeningBalanceAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountOpeningBalanceSettlements, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountClosingBalanceDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountClosingBalanceAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountClosingBalanceSettlements, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt ELSE 0 END AS AmountReceiptDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountReceipt ELSE 0 END AS AmountReceiptAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountTurnoverDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountAdvanceTurnover, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountExpense ELSE 0 END AS AmountExpenseDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountExpense ELSE 0 END AS AmountExpenseAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurOpeningBalanceDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurOpeningBalanceAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurOpeningBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurOpeningBalanceSettlements, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurClosingBalanceDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurClosingBalanceAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END - CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN -AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurClosingBalance ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurClosingBalanceCalculations, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurTurnoverDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurTurnover ELSE 0 END AS CurAmountTurnoverAdvance, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurReceiptDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurReceipt ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurReceiptPrepayment, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Debt) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurExpenseDebt, CASE WHEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.SettlementsType = VALUE(Enum.SettlementsTypes.Advance) THEN AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers.AmountCurExpense ELSE 0 END AS AmountCurExpenseAdvance FROM AccumulationRegister.AccountsPayable.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, , ) AS AccountsPayableBalancesAndTurnovers

v8:item.v8:content: Balance of settlements with suppliers (man. cur.)
Остатки по расчетам с поставщиками (упр. вал.)
